CustomField.formula: IF( $Setup.cve__ClaimInquiryOptions__c.cve__SiteUrl__c != null && cve__OpaqueId__c != null, $Setup.cve__ClaimInquiryOptions__c.cve__SiteUrl__c + '?key=' + cve__OpaqueId__c, null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: URL that customers use to inquire about their claims
CustomField.label: Inquiry Portal URL
